mapper.select:
select row_number() over(order by a.refWord desc) as rownum ,a.refWord as fileType ,count(a.refWord) as cnt from tb_file_mng a where 1=1
and a.originName like concat('%', #{sch_fileName}, '%')
and a.refWord = #{sch_fileType}
and a.uploadBy like concat('%', #{sch_uploadBy}, '%')
and #{sch_startDate} <= DATE_FORMAT(a.uploadDt, '%Y-%m-%d')
and DATE_FORMAT(a.uploadDt, '%Y-%m-%d') <= #{sch_endDate}
group by a.refWord
